Streamline Your Business with Market Leader CRM and Website

An avid Market Leader customer for the past five years, Tony Alejandre of Coldwell Banker Residential Brokerage in Pacific Heights, California uses the InTouch Pro system powered by Market Leader to manage leads and contacts. Automated campaigns ensure he stays in touch with his contacts year-round. Tony uses the customizable website to showcase his local market expertise and keep relevant content fresh for visitors. He’s able to attract and retain website visitors by making his website content community based. As Tony mentions, “if you are looking for a CRM that will streamline everything for you, look no further than InTouch and Market Leader.”

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#f4f4f4″ custom_margin=”0px|||” custom_padding=”0px|||”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”40px|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ header_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center”]
